userachievements-inauguralmember-desc: Awarded based when the user signed up for the wiki
userachievements-inauguralmember-1-desc: Join the site within 1 year of the public launch of WikiAnesthesia (by 2/4/2022)
userachievements-inauguralmember-2-desc: Edit at least one public page within 1 year of the public launch of WikiAnesthesia (by 2/4/2022)
